name: English
help: ğŸ± Welcome to Catbox Uploader! This bot can upload your files to Catbox or Litterbox, and return the file's share link. The files you uploaded mustn't violate the Catbox ToS and Litterbox ToS. Commands: /help - Send this help info /settings - Choose a language, service or file expiration. Take a look at my channel @atashare and @atabots for interesting websites and update notes! Catbox limit: Max 200 MB per file

help_settings: Tap the buttons below to see description and corresponding options.
help_setLang: To contribute translations, please check the guides on GitHub.
help_setService: Catbox: No expiration, limited to 200 MB per file Litterbox: Expired after 1/12/24/72 hours, limited to 1 GB per file Note: You can only upload to one service at a time.
help_setExpr: For files uploaded to Litterbox, they will expire after the set time. Litterbox supports 4 options below.
animatedStickers: Animated stickers are stored in .tgs format, and I currently can't convert them. Please edit the extension yourself if the file appears abnormal. You can use online converter or bots (like @tgstogifbot) to convert tgs to gif.
fileNotDetected:
No available files detected in the message.

Supported file types: documents, videos, audio, static stickers, GIF. 
Telegram server converts GIFs to mp4, so I upload them as videos.
